title: Rito: I'm Trying to File a Ticket. Why is this so hard.
body: I'm trying to help you with this account who is clearly ruining the player experience by using a lower ELO account and destroying everyone. However you ticket system keeps booting me out. Why and where should I report this.

replies.body:
Another player being overly skilled will continue to be adjusted by the matchmaking system to play against others at his skill level, and not necessarily something a player should get banned for.  If someone is legitimately attempting to dive their matchmaking rating in order to do so, then that's something we'd want to investigate further.  Your best bet is to use the reporting tool after the game to submit reports, and not the ticketing system.  

As far as why you're getting kicked out, that's a strange issue.  Try resetting your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) incase it's not getting you through submissions.  I hope that helps!

>Another player being overly skilled will continue to be adjusted by the matchmaking system to play against others at his skill level, and not necessarily something a player should get banned for.

It is if the account is bought or being boosted, something that happens plenty.
